languages.text: {n}...растресканный камень душ. Такие в изобилии украшают броню Маражая — мрачное напоминание о поверженных им собратьях с миров-кораблей.{/n}
{n}...a cracked spirit stone. Marazhai's armour bears many such adornments — grim reminders of his triumphs over his distant craftworld kin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}…ひび割れた魂縛石だ。マラズハイの鎧にはこのような装飾が数多く施されている。彼が遠く離れた方舟の同胞たちに勝利してきたことをほの暗く物語っていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a cracked spirit stone. Marazhai's armour bears many such adornments — grim reminders of his triumphs over his distant craftworld kin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}…ひび割れた魂縛石だ。マラズハイの鎧にはこのような装飾が数多く施されている。彼が遠く離れた方舟の同胞たちに勝利してきたことをほの暗く物語っていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}... ein gespaltener Seelenstein. Marazhais Rüstung weist viele solche Verzierungen auf – düstere Erinnerungen an Triumphe über seine fernen Verwandten auf dem Weltenschiff.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a cracked spirit stone. Marazhai's armour bears many such adornments — grim reminders of his triumphs over his distant craftworld kin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... ein gespaltener Seelenstein. Marazhais Rüstung weist viele solche Verzierungen auf – düstere Erinnerungen an Triumphe über seine fernen Verwandten auf dem Weltenschiff.{/n}

languages.text: {n}... une pierre-esprit craquelée. L'armure de Marazhai est ornée de nombreuses pierres similaires, sinistres trophées commémorant ses triomphes contre ses lointains cousins des vaisseaux-mondes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a cracked spirit stone. Marazhai's armour bears many such adornments — grim reminders of his triumphs over his distant craftworld kin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}... una joya espiritual agrietada. Se trata de uno de los muchos adornos que decoran la armadura de Marazhai, macabros recordatorios de sus triunfos sobre sus parientes del mundo astronave.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a cracked spirit stone. Marazhai's armour bears many such adornments — grim reminders of his triumphs over his distant craftworld kin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}……那是一块破碎的灵魂石。玛拉斋的盔甲上有许多这样的装饰品，每块灵魂石都代表一位败在他手上、来自方舟世界的远房表亲。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a cracked spirit stone. Marazhai's armour bears many such adornments — grim reminders of his triumphs over his distant craftworld kin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}……那是一块破碎的灵魂石。玛拉斋的盔甲上有许多这样的装饰品，每块灵魂石都代表一位败在他手上、来自方舟世界的远房表亲。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kırılmış ruh taşı. Marazhai'ın zırhında bunun gibi pek çok süs bulunuyor. Bunlar, uzaklardaki gemidünyalı soydaşlarına karşı zaferlerini hatırlatan uğursuz izler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a cracked spirit stone. Marazhai's armour bears many such adornments — grim reminders of his triumphs over his distant craftworld kin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kırılmış ruh taşı. Marazhai'nin zırhında bunun gibi pek çok süsleme bulunuyor. Uzaklardaki gemidünya soydaşları üzerindeki zaferlerini hatırlatan uğursuz izler.{/n}
